definition: to face/to overlook/to arrive/to be (just) about to/just before

sentences.english: Clarify the oil painting art language real meaning and the existence values of the critical appearance.
sentences.chinese: 闡明油畫藝術語言臨界狀態的真正意義和存在價值。

sentences.english: The shortterm and impending method of earthquake prediction must be based on features of the critical state.
sentences.chinese: 因此，地震短臨預報方法必須基於臨界狀態的特點。

sentences.english: At critical state, micro- cutting has been found on steel surface.
sentences.chinese: 在臨界狀態下，EMP材料對鋼表面產生微切削。
